name: Wholi
description: E-commerce platform for local farmers to sell their produce directly to consumers.

name: Utah Road Conditions
description: Real-time live map showing current snow and road conditions across Utah's highway system. Helps drivers stay safe during winter weather.

name: JARVIS
description: AI-powered voice assistant with Tony Stark-inspired AR interface. Features wake word detection, real-time audio visualization, and hands-free interaction. Built for Mission to Mars hackathon.

name: Learnable
description: AI-powered educational platform with personalized lessons, interactive code execution, and real-time chat. Won 2nd place at Weber State Hackathon.

name: PhoneAgent
description: Autonomous Android device controller using multimodal AI agents. Converts natural language to device operations. Won 2nd place at JustBuild AI Agents Hackathon.

name: Linguava - In Progress
description: AI-first language learning application with personalized lessons and interactive practice.

name: Neural Network Bird
description: A neural network that learns to fly a bird through incoming pipes using genetic algorithms and backpropagation.

name: Old Portfolio Website
description: My previous portfolio website using three.js for 3D graphics and animations.
